original_text: I know that, after my death, you will do more and more wicked things. You will turn away from the good things that I have commanded you to do. In future days, you will do wicked things against the Lord. Because of that, you will have great trouble. You will make the Lord angry because of the things that you do.’
korean_text: 내가 알거니와 내가 죽은 후에 너희가 스스로 부패하여 내가 너희에게 명령한 길을 떠나 여호와의 목전에 악을 행하여 너희의 손으로 하는 일로 그를 격노하게 하므로 너희가 후일에 재앙을 당하리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: I know that, after my death
you will do more and more wicked things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 점점 더 악한 일을 할 것이라는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: You will turn away from the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 선한 것들에게서 등을 돌릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: that I have commanded you to do
In future days, you will do wicked things
sentences.korean_translation: 장래의 날들에 너희는 악한 일을 행할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Because of that, you will have great trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때문에 너희는 큰 곤경을 겪을 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will make the Lord angry
because of the things that you do
